pages.text: A floating torpedo decoy, deployed by $(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/submarines/barcross)Barcross/$.

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/torpedo_net)$(l)Torpedo Decoy/$$(br)This decoy $(l)protects the tile it is deployed on/$ from $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/torpedo)Torpedoes/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
